Sentencas: The article presents a comparison of mathematical models of steam methane reforming.
Titulo: Comparison of mathematical models of steam methane reforming process for the needs of fuel cells

Sentencas: The analysis is divided into two parts.
Titulo: Comparison of mathematical models of steam methane reforming process for the needs of fuel cells

Sentencas: The first concerns the reforming process using separate steam reformers.
Titulo: Comparison of mathematical models of steam methane reforming process for the needs of fuel cells

Sentencas: The second part of the article compares models of steam methane reforming processes directly inside fuel cells.
Titulo: Comparison of mathematical models of steam methane reforming process for the needs of fuel cells

Sentencas: Due to the fact that the steam reforming process takes place at very high temperatures, internal steam reforming can only be carried out in high temperature fuel cells.
Titulo: Comparison of mathematical models of steam methane reforming process for the needs of fuel cells

Sentencas: Therefore, the second part of the article deals with molten carbonate fuel cells and solid oxide fuel cells powered by methane.
Titulo: Comparison of mathematical models of steam methane reforming process for the needs of fuel cells

Sentencas: In the case of both of fuel cells, the methane steam reforming may take place directly on the anodes of these electrochemical devices.
Titulo: Comparison of mathematical models of steam methane reforming process for the needs of fuel cells

Sentencas: The mathematical models (for both external and internal reforming) were compared based on available experimental data.
Titulo: Comparison of mathematical models of steam methane reforming process for the needs of fuel cells

Sentencas: In this analysis of mathematical models, particular attention was paid to the causes of discrepancies between the mathematical models and the experimental data.
Titulo: Comparison of mathematical models of steam methane reforming process for the needs of fuel cells

Sentencas: The steam reforming process is influenced by a number of different parameters such as: temperature, ratio of the amount of water vapor to carbon contained in the fuel (steam to carbon ratio), reaction time, presence of a catalyst, type of catalyst and many others.
Titulo: Comparison of mathematical models of steam methane reforming process for the needs of fuel cells

Sentencas: The models presented in this article were also compared in terms of taking into account various parameters that may affect the process of steam reforming.
Titulo: Comparison of mathematical models of steam methane reforming process for the needs of fuel cells

Sentencas: An attempt was also made to assess the accuracy of mathematical models.
Titulo: Comparison of mathematical models of steam methane reforming process for the needs of fuel cells

Sentencas: Unfortunately, for most of the equations considered in this article, numerical values for inaccuracies are not given or described as acceptable or minor.(c) 2023
Titulo: Comparison of mathematical models of steam methane reforming process for the needs of fuel cells
